definition: stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: They manufacture paper supplies, notebooks, and Trapper Keepers, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 他们制造纸张，笔记本，夹子和其他许多文具。

sentences.english: The cupboard writing materials in my office was always lucked in case of stealing.
sentences.chinese: 我办公室的文具柜总是上着锁，防止有人偷东西。

sentences.english: My Writing case not only looks beautiful and very large role.
sentences.chinese: 我的文具盒不仅外表美丽，而且作用非常大。

sentences.english: We can also make stationery, Mulberry paper products to your specifications.
sentences.chinese: 我们也可以使文具，桑树纸制品到您的规格。

sentences.english: They were at the stationer's on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 他们星期天在文具店里。

sentences.english: Beifa Brand Stationery is an International famous brand.
sentences.chinese: 贝发牌文具是国际著名的品牌。

sentences.english: Pens and stationery are placed in the stationery holders.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔和文具放在文具盒里。

sentences.english: Pens and stationery are placed in the stationery holders.
sentences.chinese: 钢笔和文具放在文具盒里。

sentences.english: Lucy will order any stationery you need.
sentences.chinese: 露西将订购任何你需要的文具。

sentences.english: Hello, welcome to Wenzhou Chengjia Stationery Limited Company. Please hold on…
sentences.chinese: 欢迎您致电温州市成佳文具有限公司，请稍等已转接。

sentences.english: Office Stationery Manufacturing in the US - Industry Risk Rating R…
sentences.chinese: 美国办公文具制造行业风险评估报告。

sentences.english: We're opening a new book and stationery shop.
sentences.chinese: 我们开了一家新的书店和文具店。

sentences.english: Why not?need some stationery. I run out of some paper and ball pens.
sentences.chinese: 我想买一些文具用品，我的纸盒圆珠笔都没了。

sentences.english: Let me show you how to do. T and 2 students make a demo.
sentences.chinese: 要求其中一个学生带一些文具出来。

sentences.english: Dad went to buy some stationery as souvenirs for my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 父亲去买了一些文具作为记念品送给堂弟。
